layout.name: depthX
layout.title: Horizontal Parallax
layout.tooltip: The amount of parallax that the draggadon will have on it's X Axis, where 1 is following the camera and 0 is nothing.

layout.name: depthY
layout.title: Vertical Parallax
layout.tooltip: The amount of parallax that the draggadon will have on it's Y Axis, where 1 is following the camera and 0 is nothing.

layout.name: limitL
layout.title: Left Limit
layout.tooltip: A limit to where the draggadon can move, measured in 32x32 Blocks.

layout.name: limitR
layout.title: Right Limit
layout.tooltip: A limit to where the draggadon can move, measured in 32x32 Blocks.

layout.name: limitU
layout.title: Up Limit
layout.tooltip: A limit to where the draggadon can move, measured in 32x32 Blocks.

layout.name: limitD
layout.title: Down Limit
layout.tooltip: A limit to where the draggadon can move, measured in 32x32 Blocks.

layout.name: Cooldown
layout.title: Cooldown Between Rounds
layout.tooltip: How much time the draggadon will wait to shoot either breathed fireballs or rain down fireballs after one round is finished, measured in seconds.

layout.name: DBFB
layout.title: Delay between breathed Projectiles
layout.tooltip: The delay between breathed fireballs on a single round, measured in seconds.

layout.name: FPRB
layout.title: Breathe Fireballs per Round
layout.tooltip: How many breathed Fireballs will be shot after the Cooldown between rounds finishes.

layout.name: DBFR
layout.title: Delay between raining Projectiles
layout.tooltip: The delay between breathed fireballs on a single round, measured in seconds.

layout.name: FPRR
layout.title: Raining Fireballs per Round
layout.tooltip: How many breathed Fireballs will be shot after the Cooldown between rounds finishes.
